channel.title: Help
channel.description:
ok so im not sure if this should go here but here i go
My dad has a live cd of lonux he showed me it and i really like it so i put it into my laptop and did everything when we went onto the desktop it said live install so nwe installed it so now i can choose from linux or windows which is pretty sweet but anyway when ever i tried to install a game from a cd or msn which was a downloaded file and even flash player and i dont know what to do becuase i dad didnt really know either so could anybody help me it comes up with something cannot find then somthing like /home/ali/desktop i cant honestly tell you
Thank you
